content: Head along the far wooden platforms past where the Bullguard was stationed to find one last Wolf Sentinel and Archer, and Cloud Step past the melee attacker to slam into the archer first before finishing off his friend.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Outside the Cave'.
The content is as follows:
Head along the far wooden platforms past where the Bullguard was stationed to find one last Wolf Sentinel and Archer, and Cloud Step past the melee attacker to slam into the archer first before finishing off his friend.
